Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fork, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing, Can inflict an Infernal Wound that causes the creature to bleed every turn

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Horned Devil makes 3 melee attacks, two with its fork and one with its tail.  It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack
Other Actions.Action 2: Hurl Flame, Ranged Spell Attack, Range: 150ft, Average Damage: 14 Fire

Abilities.Ability 1: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
